titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives regarding funding for feeding assistance programs, especially those affecting children.
Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives regarding funding for feeding assistance programs, especially those affecting children.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Nutrition and Horticulture .

bill.summary: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that there should be no reduction in funding for feeding assistance programs, especially those affecting children.
